00118 /// OBJECT POOL FUNCTIONS
00119 INT32 GetFreeObjectSlot(void)
00120 {
00121       UINT32 uiCount;
00122 
00123       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumObjectSlots; uiCount++)
00124       {
00125             if(( ObjectSlots[uiCount].fAllocated == FALSE ) )
00126                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00127       }
00128 
00129       if(guiNumObjectSlots < NUM_OBJECT_SLOTS )
00130             return((INT32)guiNumObjectSlots++);
00131 
00132       return(-1);
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 void RecountObjectSlots(void)
00137 {
00138       INT32 uiCount;
00139 
00140       for(uiCount=guiNumObjectSlots-1; (uiCount >=0) ; uiCount--)
00141       {
00142             if( ( ObjectSlots[uiCount].fAllocated ) )
00143             {
00144                   guiNumObjectSlots=(UINT32)(uiCount+1);
00145                   return;
00146             }
00147       }
00148 
00149   guiNumObjectSlots = 0;
00150 }

00153 INT32 CreatePhysicalObject( OBJECTTYPE *pGameObj, real dLifeLength, real xPos, real yPos, real zPos, real xForce, real yForce, real zForce, UINT8 ubOwner, UINT8 ubActionCode, UINT32 uiActionData )
00154 {
00155       INT32             iObjectIndex;
00156       FLOAT             mass;
00157       REAL_OBJECT       *pObject;
00158 
00159       if( ( iObjectIndex = GetFreeObjectSlot() )==(-1) )
00160             return(-1);
00161 
00162       pObject = &( ObjectSlots[ iObjectIndex ] );
00163 
00164       memset( pObject, 0, sizeof( REAL_OBJECT ) );
00165 
00166       // OK, GET OBJECT DATA AND COPY
00167       memcpy( &(pObject->Obj), pGameObj, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
00168 
00169       // Get mass
00170       mass =  CALCULATE_OBJECT_MASS( Item[pGameObj->usItem ].ubWeight );
00171 
00172       // If mass is z, make it something!
00173       if ( mass == 0 )
00174       {
00175             mass = 10;
00176       }
00177 
00178       // OK, mass determines the smoothness of the physics integration
00179       // For gameplay, we will use mass for maybe max throw distance
00180       mass = 60;
00181 
00182       // Set lifelength
00183       pObject->dLifeLength = dLifeLength;
00184 
00185       pObject->fAllocated           = TRUE;
00186       pObject->fAlive                           = TRUE;
00187       pObject->fApplyFriction  = FALSE;
00188   pObject->iSoundID        = NO_SAMPLE;
00189 
00190       // Set values
00191       pObject->OneOverMass = 1 / mass;
00192       pObject->Position.x     = xPos;
00193       pObject->Position.y     = yPos;
00194       pObject->Position.z     = zPos;
00195       pObject->fVisible       = TRUE;
00196       pObject->ubOwner    = ubOwner;
00197       pObject->ubActionCode = ubActionCode;
00198       pObject->uiActionData = uiActionData;
00199       pObject->fDropItem            = TRUE;
00200   pObject->ubLastTargetTakenDamage = NOBODY;
00201 
00202       pObject->fFirstTimeMoved = TRUE;
00203 
00204       pObject->InitialForce.x = SCALE_VERT_VAL_TO_HORZ( xForce );
00205       pObject->InitialForce.y = SCALE_VERT_VAL_TO_HORZ( yForce );
00206       pObject->InitialForce.z = zForce ;
00207 
00208       pObject->InitialForce = VDivScalar( &(pObject->InitialForce), (float)TIME_MULTI );
00209       pObject->InitialForce = VMultScalar( &(pObject->InitialForce), 1.5 );
00210             
00211 
00212       // Calculate gridNo
00213       pObject->sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)yPos / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)xPos / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
00214       pObject->iID = iObjectIndex;
00215       pObject->pNode = NULL;
00216       pObject->pShadow = NULL;
00217 
00218       // If gridno not equal to NOWHERE, use sHeight of alnd....
00219       if ( pObject->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
00220       {
00221             pObject->Position.z += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].sHeight );
00222             pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition.z += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].sHeight );
00223       }
00224 
00225       PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "NewPhysics Object")  );
00226 
00227       return( iObjectIndex );
00228 }

00231 BOOLEAN RemoveObjectSlot( INT32 iObject )
00232 {
00233       CHECKF( iObject < NUM_OBJECT_SLOTS );
00234 
00235       ObjectSlots[iObject].fAllocated=FALSE;
00236 
00237       RecountObjectSlots();
00238 
00239       return( TRUE );
00240 }

00243 void SimulateWorld(  )
00244 {
00245       UINT32                              cnt;
00246       REAL_OBJECT       *pObject;
00247 
00248 
00249       if ( COUNTERDONE( PHYSICSUPDATE ) )
00250       {
00251             RESETCOUNTER( PHYSICSUPDATE );
00252 
00253             for( cnt = 0;cnt < guiNumObjectSlots; cnt++)
00254             {
00255                   // CHECK FOR ALLOCATED
00256                   if( ObjectSlots[ cnt ].fAllocated )
00257                   {
00258                         // Get object
00259                         pObject = &( ObjectSlots[ cnt ] );
00260 
00261                         SimulateObject( pObject, (real)DELTA_T );
00262                   }
00263             }
00264       }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void RemoveAllPhysicsObjects( )
00268 {
00269       UINT32                              cnt;
00270 
00271       for( cnt = 0;cnt < guiNumObjectSlots; cnt++)
00272       {
00273             // CHECK FOR ALLOCATED
00274             if( ObjectSlots[ cnt ].fAllocated )
00275             {
00276                   PhysicsDeleteObject( &(ObjectSlots[ cnt ]) );
00277             }
00278       }
00279 }

00281 
00282 void SimulateObject( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, real deltaT )
00283 {
00284       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject");
00285       real DeltaTime     = 0;
00286       real CurrentTime = 0;
00287       real TargetTime = DeltaTime;
00288       INT32             iCollisionID;
00289       BOOLEAN           fEndThisObject = FALSE;
00290 
00291       if ( !PhysicsUpdateLife( pObject, (float)deltaT ) )
00292       {
00293 //          DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: don't update life, returning");
00294             return;
00295       }
00296 
00297 //    DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: check life");
00298       if ( pObject->fAlive )
00299       {
00300             CurrentTime = 0;
00301             TargetTime = (float)deltaT;
00302 
00303             //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: do subtime");
00304             // Do subtime here....
00305             DeltaTime = (float)deltaT / (float)10;
00306 
00307             if ( !PhysicsComputeForces( pObject ) )
00308             {
00309 //                DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: couldn't compute forces");
00310                   return;
00311             }
00312 
00313             while( CurrentTime < TargetTime )
00314             {
00315 //MADD TO KAIDEN: HERE IS THE PROBLEM:  For some reason fEndThisObject is never set to true
00316 //                DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SimulateObject: in loop while CurrentTime < TargetTime: %d < %d",CurrentTime,TargetTime));
00317 
00318                   if ( !PhysicsIntegrate( pObject, DeltaTime ) )
00319                   {
00320                         fEndThisObject = TRUE;
00321                         break;
00322                   }
00323 
00324                   if ( !PhysicsHandleCollisions( pObject, &iCollisionID, DeltaTime  ) )
00325                   {
00326                         fEndThisObject = TRUE;
00327                         break;
00328                   }
00329 
00330                   if ( iCollisionID != COLLISION_NONE )
00331                   {
00332                         break;
00333                   }
00334 
00335                   CurrentTime += DeltaTime;
00336             }
00337 
00338             //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: check if ending this object");
00339             if ( fEndThisObject )
00340             {
00341                   //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: object ended, returning");
00342                   return;
00343             }
00344 
00345             //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: try moving the object");
00346             if ( !PhysicsMoveObject( pObject ) )
00347             {
00348                   //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"SimulateObject: couldn't move object, returning");
00349                   return;
00350             }
00351 
00352       }
00353 }
00354 
00355 
00356 BOOLEAN     PhysicsComputeForces( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
00357 {
00358       vector_3                vTemp;
00359 
00360       // Calculate forces
00361       pObject->Force = VSetEqual( &(pObject->InitialForce ) );
00362 
00363       // Note: Only apply gravity if we are not resting on some structure surface
00364       if ( !pObject->fZOnRest )
00365       {
00366             pObject->Force.z -= (real)GRAVITY;
00367       }
00368 
00369       // Set intial force to zero
00370       pObject->InitialForce = VMultScalar( &(pObject->InitialForce ), 0 );
00371 
00372       if ( pObject->fApplyFriction )
00373       {
00374             vTemp = VMultScalar( &(pObject->Velocity), -pObject->AppliedMu );
00375             pObject->Force = VAdd( &(vTemp), &(pObject->Force) );
00376 
00377             pObject->fApplyFriction = FALSE;
00378       }
00379 
00380       if( fDampingActive )
00381       {
00382             vTemp = VMultScalar( &(pObject->Velocity), -Kdl );
00383             pObject->Force = VAdd( &(vTemp), &(pObject->Force) );
00384 
00385       }
00386 
00387       return( TRUE );
00388 }
00389 
00390 BOOLEAN     PhysicsUpdateLife( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, real DeltaTime )
00391 {
00392       UINT8 bLevel = 0;
00393 
00394       pObject->dLifeSpan += DeltaTime;
00395 
00396       // End life if time has ran out or we are stationary
00397       if ( pObject->dLifeLength != -1 )
00398       {
00399             if ( pObject->dLifeSpan > pObject->dLifeLength )
00400             {
00401                   pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00402             }
00403 
00404       }
00405 
00406       // End life if we are out of bounds....
00407       if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( pObject->sGridNo ) )
00408       {
00409             pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00410       }
00411 
00412       if ( !pObject->fAlive )
00413       {
00414             if ( !pObject->fTestObject )
00415             {
00416                   int i = 0;
00417             }
00418 
00419             // ATE: OK, adjust gridno based on where we ended and if we hit any walls....
00420             {
00421                   // Check for SW wall...
00422                   real remainder;
00423 
00424                   remainder = (float)fmod( pObject->Position.x, CELL_X_SIZE );
00425 
00426                   if ( remainder >= 9 )
00427                   {
00428                         // DO we have a wall here?
00429                         if ( WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( pObject->sGridNo ) )
00430                         {
00431                               // Adjust forward 1!
00432                               pObject->sGridNo += 1;
00433                         }
00434                   }
00435 
00436                   // Now SE wall
00437                   remainder = (float)fmod( pObject->Position.y,  CELL_X_SIZE );
00438 
00439                   if ( remainder >= 9 )
00440                   {
00441                         // DO we have a wall here?
00442                         if ( WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( pObject->sGridNo ) )
00443                         {
00444                               // Adjust forward 1!
00445                               pObject->sGridNo += WORLD_COLS;
00446                         }
00447                   }
00448             }
00449 
00450             pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00451 
00452             if ( !pObject->fTestObject )
00453             {
00454       if ( pObject->iSoundID != NO_SAMPLE )
00455       {
00456         SoundStop( pObject->iSoundID );
00457       }
00458 
00459                   if ( pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM && !pObject->fInWater )
00460                   {
00461                         HandleArmedObjectImpact( pObject );
00462                   }
00463                   else
00464                   {
00465                         // If we are in water, and we are a sinkable item...
00466 //                      if ( !pObject->fInWater || !( Item[ pObject->Obj.usItem ].fFlags & ITEM_SINKS ) )
00467                         if ( !pObject->fInWater || !( Item[ pObject->Obj.usItem ].sinks  ) )
00468                         {
00469                               if ( pObject->fDropItem )
00470                               {
00471                                     // ATE: If we have collided with roof last...
00472                                     if ( pObject->iOldCollisionCode == COLLISION_ROOF )
00473                                     {
00474                                           bLevel = 1;
00475                                     }
00476 
00477                                     // ATE: Yet another hack here, to make sure things don't fall through roofs
00478                                 if ( pObject->ubLastTargetTakenDamage != NOBODY )
00479                                     {
00480                                           SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00481 
00482                                           pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pObject->ubLastTargetTakenDamage ];
00483 
00484                                           bLevel = pSoldier->bLevel;
00485                                     }
00486 
00487                                     // ATE; If an armed object, don't add....
00488                                     if ( pObject->ubActionCode != THROW_ARM_ITEM )
00489                                     {
00490                                           AddItemToPool( pObject->sGridNo, &( pObject->Obj ), 1, bLevel, 0, -1 );
00491                                     }
00492                               }
00493                         }
00494                   }
00495 
00496                   // Make impact noise....
00497                   if ( Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].rock )
00498                   {
00499                         MakeNoise( pObject->ubOwner, pObject->sGridNo, 0, gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].ubTerrainID, (UINT8) (9 + PreRandom( 9 ) ), NOISE_ROCK_IMPACT );
00500                   }
00501                   else if ( Item[ pObject->Obj.usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GRENADE )
00502                   {
00503                         MakeNoise( pObject->ubOwner, pObject->sGridNo, 0, gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].ubTerrainID, (UINT8) (9 + PreRandom( 9 ) ), NOISE_GRENADE_IMPACT );
00504                   }
00505 
00506                   if ( !pObject->fTestObject && pObject->iOldCollisionCode == COLLISION_GROUND )
00507                   {
00508                         PlayJA2Sample( THROW_IMPACT_2, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pObject->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pObject->sGridNo ) );                 
00509                   }
00510 
00511                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., PHYSICS OBJECT DONE effect gone off") );
00512                   ReduceAttackBusyCount( pObject->ubOwner, FALSE );
00513 
00514                   // ATE: Handle end of animation...
00515                   if ( pObject->fCatchAnimOn )
00516                   {
00517                         SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00518 
00519                         pObject->fCatchAnimOn = FALSE;
00520 
00521                         // Get intended target
00522                         pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pObject->uiActionData ];
00523 
00524                         // Catch anim.....
00525                         switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
00526                         {
00527                               case ANIM_STAND:
00528 
00529                                     pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
00530                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_CATCH, 0 , FALSE );
00531                                     break;
00532 
00533                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
00534 
00535                                     pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
00536                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_CROUCH_CATCH, 0 , FALSE );
00537                                     break;
00538                         }
00539 
00540                         PlayJA2Sample( CATCH_OBJECT, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );                 
00541 
00542                   }
00543             }
00544 
00545             PhysicsDeleteObject( pObject );
00546             return( FALSE );
00547       }
00548 
00549       return( TRUE );
00550 }

00552 
00553 BOOLEAN     PhysicsIntegrate( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, real DeltaTime )
00554 {
00555       vector_3                vTemp;
00556 
00557       // Save old position
00558       pObject->OldPosition = VSetEqual( &(pObject->Position) );
00559       pObject->OldVelocity = VSetEqual( &(pObject->Velocity) );
00560 
00561       vTemp = VMultScalar( &(pObject->Velocity), DeltaTime );
00562       pObject->Position = VAdd( &(pObject->Position), &vTemp );
00563 
00564       // Save test TargetPosition
00565       if ( pObject->fTestPositionNotSet )
00566       {
00567             pObject->TestTargetPosition    = VSetEqual( &(pObject->Position) );
00568       }
00569 
00570       vTemp = VMultScalar( &(pObject->Force), ( DeltaTime * pObject->OneOverMass ) );
00571       pObject->Velocity = VAdd( &(pObject->Velocity), &vTemp );
00572 
00573   if ( pObject->fPotentialForDebug )
00574   {
00575         PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Force          %f %f %f", pObject->iID, pObject->Force.x, pObject->Force.y, pObject->Force.z ) );
00576         PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Velocity %f %f %f", pObject->iID, pObject->Velocity.x, pObject->Velocity.y, pObject->Velocity.z ) );
00577         PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Position %f %f %f", pObject->iID, pObject->Position.x, pObject->Position.y, pObject->Position.z ) );
00578         PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Delta Pos %f %f %f", pObject->iID, (pObject->OldPosition.x - pObject->Position.x ), (pObject->OldPosition.y - pObject->Position.y ), ( pObject->OldPosition.z - pObject->Position.z ) ) );
00579   }
00580 
00581 //  if ( pObject->Obj.usItem == MORTAR_SHELL && !pObject->fTestObject && pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM )
00582 //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 524, usItemClass=%d",Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].usItemClass)); 
00583 
00584   if ( Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].usItemClass == IC_BOMB && !pObject->fTestObject && pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM )
00585   {
00586      // Start soud if we have reached our max height
00587     if ( pObject->OldVelocity.z >= 0 && pObject->Velocity.z < 0 )
00588     {
00589       if ( pObject->iSoundID == NO_SAMPLE )
00590       {
00591         pObject->iSoundID =   PlayJA2Sample( MORTAR_WHISTLE, RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );              
00592       }
00593     }
00594   }
00595 
00596       return( TRUE );
00597 }
00598 
00599 
00600 BOOLEAN     PhysicsHandleCollisions( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, INT32 *piCollisionID, real DeltaTime )
00601 {
00602       FLOAT                         dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dDeltaZ;
00603 
00604 
00605       if ( PhysicsCheckForCollisions( pObject, piCollisionID ) )
00606       {
00607 
00608             dDeltaX = pObject->Position.x - pObject->OldPosition.x; 
00609             dDeltaY = pObject->Position.y - pObject->OldPosition.y; 
00610             dDeltaZ = pObject->Position.z - pObject->OldPosition.z; 
00611 
00612             if ( dDeltaX <= EPSILONV && dDeltaX >= -EPSILONV && 
00613                          dDeltaY <= EPSILONV && dDeltaY >= -EPSILONV ) 
00614             {
00615                   pObject->sConsecutiveZeroVelocityCollisions++;
00616             }
00617 
00618             if ( pObject->sConsecutiveZeroVelocityCollisions > 3 )
00619             {
00620                   // We will continue with our Z velocity
00621                   pObject->Velocity.x = 0;
00622                   pObject->Velocity.y = 0;
00623 
00624                   // Check that we are not colliding with structure z
00625                   //if ( *piCollisionID == COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z || *piCollisionID == COLLISION_ROOF )
00626                   if ( *piCollisionID == COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z || *piCollisionID == COLLISION_ROOF || *piCollisionID == COLLISION_GROUND )
00627                   {
00628                         pObject->Velocity.z = 0;
00629 
00630                         // Set us not alive!
00631                         pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00632                   }
00633 
00634                   *piCollisionID = COLLISION_NONE;
00635             }
00636             else
00637             {
00638                   // Set position back to before collision
00639                   pObject->Position = VSetEqual( &(pObject->OldPosition) );
00640                   // Set old position!
00641                   pObject->OldPosition.x = pObject->Position.y - dDeltaX;
00642                   pObject->OldPosition.y = pObject->Position.x - dDeltaY;
00643                   pObject->OldPosition.z = pObject->Position.z - dDeltaZ;
00644 
00645                   PhysicsResolveCollision( pObject, &(pObject->CollisionVelocity), &(pObject->CollisionNormal), pObject->CollisionElasticity ); 
00646             }
00647 
00648             if ( pObject->Position.z < 0 )
00649             {
00650                   pObject->Position.z = 0;
00651             }
00652             //otherwise, continue falling downwards!
00653 
00654             // TO STOP?
00655             
00656             // Check for delta position values
00657             if ( dDeltaZ <= EPSILONP && dDeltaZ >= -EPSILONP && 
00658                          dDeltaY <= EPSILONP && dDeltaY >= -EPSILONP && 
00659                          dDeltaX <= EPSILONP && dDeltaX >= -EPSILONP ) 
00660             {
00661                   //pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00662                   //return( FALSE );
00663             }
00664 
00665             // Check for repeated collisions...
00666             //if ( pObject->iOldCollisionCode == COLLISION_ROOF || pObject->iOldCollisionCode == COLLISION_GROUND || pObject->iOldCollisionCode == COLLISION_WATER )
00667             {
00668                   // ATE: This is a safeguard
00669                   if ( pObject->sConsecutiveCollisions > 30 )
00670                   {
00671                         pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00672                         return( FALSE );
00673                   }
00674             }
00675 
00676             // Check for -ve velocity still...
00677             /*if ( pObject->Velocity.z <= EPSILONV && pObject->Velocity.z >= -EPSILONV && 
00678                          pObject->Velocity.y <= EPSILONV && pObject->Velocity.y >= -EPSILONV && 
00679                          pObject->Velocity.x <= EPSILONV && pObject->Velocity.x >= -EPSILONV ) 
00680             {
00681                   PhysicsDeleteObject( pObject );
00682                   pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00683                   return( FALSE );
00684             }*/
00685       }
00686 
00687       return( TRUE );
00688 }
00689 
00690 void PhysicsDeleteObject( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
00691 {
00692       if ( pObject->fAllocated )
00693       {
00694             if ( pObject->pNode != NULL )
00695             {
00696                   RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo, pObject->pNode );
00697             }
00698 
00699             if ( pObject->pShadow != NULL )
00700             {
00701                   RemoveShadowFromLevelNode( pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo, pObject->pShadow );
00702             }
00703 
00704 
00705             RemoveObjectSlot( pObject->iID );
00706       }
00707 }
00708 
00709 
00710 BOOLEAN     PhysicsCheckForCollisions( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, INT32 *piCollisionID )
00711 {
00712       vector_3                vTemp;
00713       FLOAT                         dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dDeltaZ, dX, dY, dZ;
00714       INT32                         iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00715       BOOLEAN                       fDoCollision = FALSE;
00716       FLOAT                         dElasity = 1;
00717       UINT16                        usStructureID;
00718       FLOAT                         dNormalX, dNormalY, dNormalZ;
00719       INT16                         sGridNo;
00720 
00721       // Checkf for collisions
00722       dX = pObject->Position.x;
00723       dY = pObject->Position.y;
00724       dZ = pObject->Position.z;
00725 
00726       vTemp.x = 0;      
00727       vTemp.y = 0;      
00728       vTemp.z = 0;
00729 
00730       dDeltaX = dX - pObject->OldPosition.x; 
00731       dDeltaY = dY - pObject->OldPosition.y; 
00732       dDeltaZ = dZ - pObject->OldPosition.z; 
00733 
00734       //Round delta pos to nearest 0.01
00735       //dDeltaX = (float)( (int)dDeltaX * 100 ) / 100;
00736       //dDeltaY = (float)( (int)dDeltaY * 100 ) / 100;
00737       //dDeltaZ = (float)( (int)dDeltaZ * 100 ) / 100;
00738 
00739       // SKIP FIRST GRIDNO, WE'LL COLLIDE WITH OURSELVES....
00740       if ( pObject->fTestObject != TEST_OBJECT_NO_COLLISIONS )
00741       {
00742             iCollisionCode = CheckForCollision( dX, dY, dZ, dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dDeltaZ, (INT16 *)&usStructureID, &dNormalX, &dNormalY, &dNormalZ );
00743       }
00744       else if ( pObject->fTestObject == TEST_OBJECT_NO_COLLISIONS )
00745       {
00746             iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00747 
00748             // Are we on a downward slope?
00749             if ( dZ < pObject->TestZTarget && dDeltaZ < 0 )
00750             {
00751                   if (pObject->fTestPositionNotSet )
00752                   {
00753                         if ( pObject->TestZTarget > 32 )
00754                         {
00755                               pObject->fTestPositionNotSet = FALSE;
00756                               pObject->TestZTarget         = 0;
00757                         }
00758                         else
00759                         {
00760                               iCollisionCode = COLLISION_GROUND;
00761                         }
00762                   }
00763                   else
00764                   {
00765                         iCollisionCode = COLLISION_GROUND;
00766                   }
00767             }
00768       }
00769 
00770 
00771       // If a test object and we have collided with something ( should only be ground ( or roof? ) )
00772       // Or destination?
00773       if ( pObject->fTestObject == TEST_OBJECT_ANY_COLLISION )
00774       {
00775             if ( iCollisionCode != COLLISION_GROUND && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_ROOF && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WATER && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_NONE )
00776             {
00777                   pObject->fTestEndedWithCollision = TRUE;
00778                   pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00779                   return( FALSE );
00780             }
00781       }
00782 
00783       if ( pObject->fTestObject == TEST_OBJECT_NOTWALLROOF_COLLISIONS )
00784       {
00785             // So we don't collide with ourselves.....
00786     if ( iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WATER && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_GROUND && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_NONE &&
00787                      iCollisionCode != COLLISION_ROOF && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF &&
00788                  iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHEAST && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHWEST &&
00789                      iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_NORTHEAST && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_NORTHWEST )
00790         {
00791               if ( pObject->fFirstTimeMoved || pObject->sFirstGridNo == pObject->sGridNo )
00792               {
00793                     iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00794               }
00795 
00796               // If we are NOT a wall or window, ignore....
00797               if ( pObject->uiNumTilesMoved < 4 )
00798               {
00799                     switch( iCollisionCode )
00800                     {
00801                           case COLLISION_MERC:
00802                           case COLLISION_STRUCTURE:
00803                           case COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z:
00804 
00805                                 // Set to no collision ( we shot past )
00806                                 iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00807                                 break;
00808                     }
00809               }
00810     }
00811 
00812 
00813             switch( iCollisionCode )
00814             {
00815                   // End test with any collision NOT a wall, roof...
00816                   case COLLISION_STRUCTURE:
00817                   case COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z:
00818 
00819                         // OK, if it's mercs... don't stop
00820                         if ( usStructureID >= INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID )
00821                         {
00822                               pObject->fTestEndedWithCollision = TRUE;
00823 
00824                               if ( !pObject->fEndedWithCollisionPositionSet )
00825                               {
00826                                     pObject->fEndedWithCollisionPositionSet = TRUE;                         
00827                                     pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition = VSetEqual( &(pObject->Position) );
00828                               }
00829                               iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00830                         }
00831                         else
00832                         {
00833                               if ( !pObject->fEndedWithCollisionPositionSet )
00834                               {
00835                                     pObject->fEndedWithCollisionPositionSet = TRUE;                         
00836                                     pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition = VSetEqual( &(pObject->Position) );
00837                               }
00838                         }
00839                         break;
00840 
00841                   case COLLISION_ROOF:
00842 
00843                         if ( !pObject->fEndedWithCollisionPositionSet )
00844                         {
00845                               pObject->fEndedWithCollisionPositionSet = TRUE;                         
00846                               pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition = VSetEqual( &(pObject->Position) );
00847                         }
00848                         break;
00849 
00850                   case COLLISION_WATER:
00851                   case COLLISION_GROUND:
00852                   case COLLISION_MERC:
00853                   case COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF:             
00854                   case COLLISION_NONE:
00855                   case COLLISION_WINDOW_SOUTHEAST:
00856                   case COLLISION_WINDOW_SOUTHWEST:
00857                   case COLLISION_WINDOW_NORTHEAST:
00858                   case COLLISION_WINDOW_NORTHWEST:
00859 
00860                         // Here we just keep going.. 
00861                         break;
00862 
00863                   default:
00864                         
00865                         // THis is for walls, windows, etc
00866                         // here, we set test ended with collision, but keep going...
00867                         pObject->fTestEndedWithCollision = TRUE;
00868                         break;
00869              }
00870       }
00871 
00872 
00873       if ( pObject->fTestObject != TEST_OBJECT_NOTWALLROOF_COLLISIONS )
00874       {
00875     if ( iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WATER && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_GROUND && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_NONE &&
00876                      iCollisionCode != COLLISION_ROOF && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF &&
00877                  iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHEAST && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHWEST &&
00878                      iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_NORTHEAST && iCollisionCode != COLLISION_WALL_NORTHWEST )
00879         {
00880               // So we don't collide with ourselves.....
00881               if ( pObject->fFirstTimeMoved || pObject->sFirstGridNo == pObject->sGridNo )
00882               {
00883                     iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00884               }
00885 
00886               // If we are NOT a wall or window, ignore....
00887               if ( pObject->uiNumTilesMoved < 4 )
00888               {
00889                     switch( iCollisionCode )
00890                     {
00891                           case COLLISION_MERC:
00892                           case COLLISION_STRUCTURE:
00893                           case COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z:
00894 
00895                                 // Set to no collision ( we shot past )
00896                                 iCollisionCode = COLLISION_NONE;
00897                                 break;
00898                     }
00899               }
00900 
00901         }
00902   }
00903 
00904       *piCollisionID = iCollisionCode;
00905 
00906 
00907       // If We hit the ground
00908       if ( iCollisionCode > COLLISION_NONE )
00909       {
00910             if ( pObject->iOldCollisionCode == iCollisionCode )
00911             {
00912                   pObject->sConsecutiveCollisions++;
00913             }
00914             else
00915             {
00916                   pObject->sConsecutiveCollisions = 1;
00917             }
00918 
00919             if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WINDOW_NORTHWEST || iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WINDOW_NORTHEAST || iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WINDOW_SOUTHWEST || iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WINDOW_SOUTHEAST )
00920             {
00921                   if ( !pObject->fTestObject )
00922                   {
00923                         // Break window!
00924                         PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Collision Window", pObject->iID ) );
00925 
00926                         sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)pObject->Position.y / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)pObject->Position.x / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
00927 
00928                         ObjectHitWindow( sGridNo, usStructureID, FALSE, TRUE );
00929                   }
00930                   *piCollisionID = COLLISION_NONE;
00931       return( FALSE );
00932             }
00933 
00934             // ATE: IF detonate on impact, stop now!
00935             if ( OBJECT_DETONATE_ON_IMPACT( pObject ) )
00936             {
00937                   pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00938                   return( TRUE );
00939             }
00940 
00941             if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_GROUND )
00942             {
00943                   vTemp.x = 0;      
00944                   vTemp.y = 0;      
00945                   vTemp.z = -1;     
00946 
00947                   pObject->fApplyFriction = TRUE;
00948                   //pObject->AppliedMu                = (float)(0.54 * TIME_MULTI );
00949                   pObject->AppliedMu                  = (float)(0.34 * TIME_MULTI );
00950 
00951                   //dElasity = (float)1.5;
00952                   dElasity = (float)1.3;
00953 
00954                   fDoCollision = TRUE;
00955 
00956                   if ( !pObject->fTestObject && !pObject->fHaveHitGround )
00957                   {
00958                         PlayJA2Sample( THROW_IMPACT_2, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pObject->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pObject->sGridNo ) );                 
00959                   }
00960 
00961                   pObject->fHaveHitGround = TRUE;
00962             }
00963             else if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WATER )
00964             {
00965                   ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
00966                   ANITILE                                   *pNode;
00967 
00968                   // Continue going...
00969                   pObject->fApplyFriction = TRUE;
00970                   pObject->AppliedMu                  = (float)(1.54 * TIME_MULTI );
00971 
00972                   sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)pObject->Position.y / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)pObject->Position.x / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
00973 
00974                   // Make thing unalive...
00975                   pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
00976 
00977                   // If first time...
00978                   if ( pObject->fVisible )
00979                   {
00980                         if ( pObject->fTestObject == NO_TEST_OBJECT )
00981                         {
00982                               // Make invisible
00983                               pObject->fVisible = FALSE;
00984 
00985                               // JA25 CJC Oct 13 1999 - if node pointer is null don't try to set flags inside it!
00986                               if( pObject->pNode )
00987                               {
00988                                     pObject->pNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_HIDDEN;
00989                               }
00990 
00991                               pObject->fInWater = TRUE;
00992 
00993                               // Make ripple
00994                               memset( &AniParams, 0, sizeof( ANITILE_PARAMS ) );
00995                               AniParams.sGridNo                                     = sGridNo;
00996                               AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
00997                               AniParams.usTileType                        = THIRDMISS;
00998                               AniParams.usTileIndex                           = THIRDMISS1;
00999                               AniParams.sDelay                                      = 50;
01000                               AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
01001                               AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_FORWARD;
01002 
01003 
01004                               if ( pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM )
01005                               {
01006                                     AniParams.ubKeyFrame1                           = 11;
01007                                     AniParams.uiKeyFrame1Code                 = ANI_KEYFRAME_CHAIN_WATER_EXPLOSION;
01008                                     AniParams.uiUserData                            = pObject->Obj.usItem;
01009                                     AniParams.ubUserData2                           = pObject->ubOwner;
01010                               }
01011 
01012                               pNode = CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01013 
01014                               // Adjust for absolute positioning
01015                               pNode->pLevelNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS;
01016 
01017                               pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeX = (INT16)pObject->Position.x;
01018                               pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeY = (INT16)pObject->Position.y;
01019                               pNode->pLevelNode->sRelativeZ = (INT16)CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( (INT16)pObject->Position.z );
01020                         }
01021                   }
01022 
01023             }
01024             else if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_ROOF || iCollisionCode == COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF )
01025             {
01026                   vTemp.x = 0;      
01027                   vTemp.y = 0;      
01028                   vTemp.z = -1;     
01029 
01030                   pObject->fApplyFriction = TRUE;
01031                   pObject->AppliedMu                  = (float)(0.54 * TIME_MULTI );
01032 
01033                   dElasity = (float)1.4;
01034 
01035                   fDoCollision = TRUE;
01036 
01037             }
01038             //else if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF )
01039             //{
01040             //    vTemp.x = 0;      
01041             //    vTemp.y = 0;      
01042       //          vTemp.z = 1;      
01043 
01044             //    pObject->fApplyFriction = TRUE;
01045             //    pObject->AppliedMu                  = (float)(0.54 * TIME_MULTI );
01046 
01047             //    dElasity = (float)1.4;
01048 
01049             //    fDoCollision = TRUE;
01050 
01051             //}
01052             else if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z )
01053             {
01054                   if ( CheckForCatcher( pObject, usStructureID ) )
01055                   {
01056                         return( FALSE );
01057                   }
01058 
01059       CheckForObjectHittingMerc( pObject, usStructureID );
01060 
01061                   vTemp.x = 0;      
01062                   vTemp.y = 0;      
01063                   vTemp.z = -1;     
01064 
01065                   pObject->fApplyFriction = TRUE;
01066                   pObject->AppliedMu                  = (float)(0.54 * TIME_MULTI );
01067 
01068                   dElasity = (float)1.2;
01069 
01070                   fDoCollision = TRUE;
01071 
01072             }
01073             else if ( iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHEAST || iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHWEST || 
01074                   iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WALL_NORTHEAST || iCollisionCode == COLLISION_WALL_NORTHWEST )
01075             {
01076                   // A wall, do stuff
01077                   vTemp.x = dNormalX;     
01078                   vTemp.y = dNormalY;     
01079                   vTemp.z = dNormalZ;
01080 
01081                   fDoCollision = TRUE;
01082 
01083                   dElasity = (float)1.1;
01084             }
01085             else
01086             {
01087                   vector_3 vIncident;
01088 
01089                   if ( CheckForCatcher( pObject, usStructureID ) )
01090                   {
01091                         return( FALSE );
01092                   }
01093 
01094       CheckForObjectHittingMerc( pObject, usStructureID );
01095 
01096                   vIncident.x = dDeltaX;
01097                   vIncident.y = dDeltaY;
01098                   vIncident.z = 0;
01099                   // Nomralize
01100                   
01101                   vIncident = VGetNormal( &vIncident );
01102 
01103                   //vTemp.x = -1;   
01104                   //vTemp.y = 0;    
01105                   //vTemp.z = 0;
01106                   vTemp.x = -1 * vIncident.x;   
01107                   vTemp.y = -1 * vIncident.y;   
01108                   vTemp.z = 0;
01109 
01110                   fDoCollision = TRUE;
01111 
01112                   dElasity = (float)1.1;
01113             }
01114 
01115             if ( fDoCollision )
01116             {
01117                         pObject->CollisionNormal.x          = vTemp.x;
01118                         pObject->CollisionNormal.y          = vTemp.y;
01119                         pObject->CollisionNormal.z          = vTemp.z;
01120                         pObject->CollisionElasticity  = dElasity;
01121                         pObject->iOldCollisionCode  = iCollisionCode;
01122 
01123                         // Save collision velocity
01124                         pObject->CollisionVelocity = VSetEqual( &(pObject->OldVelocity) );
01125 
01126         if ( pObject->fPotentialForDebug )
01127         {
01128                           PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Collision %d", pObject->iID, iCollisionCode ) );
01129                           PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Collision Normal %f %f %f", pObject->iID, vTemp.x, vTemp.y, vTemp.z ) );
01130                           PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Collision OldPos %f %f %f", pObject->iID, pObject->Position.x, pObject->Position.y, pObject->Position.z ) );
01131                           PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: Collision Velocity %f %f %f", pObject->iID, pObject->CollisionVelocity.x, pObject->CollisionVelocity.y, pObject->CollisionVelocity.z ) );
01132         }
01133 
01134                         pObject->fColliding = TRUE;
01135 
01136             }
01137             else
01138             {
01139                   pObject->fColliding = FALSE;
01140                   pObject->sConsecutiveCollisions = 0;
01141                   pObject->sConsecutiveZeroVelocityCollisions = 0;
01142                   pObject->fHaveHitGround = FALSE;
01143             }
01144       }     
01145 
01146       return( fDoCollision );
01147 }
01148 
01149 
01150 void PhysicsResolveCollision( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, vector_3 *pVelocity, vector_3 *pNormal, real CoefficientOfRestitution )
01151 {
01152       real ImpulseNumerator, Impulse; 
01153       vector_3                vTemp;
01154             
01155       ImpulseNumerator = -1 * CoefficientOfRestitution * VDotProduct( pVelocity , pNormal );
01156 
01157       Impulse = ImpulseNumerator;
01158 
01159       vTemp = VMultScalar( pNormal, Impulse );
01160 
01161       pObject->Velocity = VAdd( &(pObject->Velocity), &vTemp );
01162 
01163 }
01164 
01165 BOOLEAN PhysicsMoveObject( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
01166 {
01167       LEVELNODE *pNode;
01168       INT16             sNewGridNo, sTileIndex;
01169   ETRLEObject           *pTrav;
01170       HVOBJECT                hVObject;
01171 
01172       
01173       //Determine new gridno
01174       sNewGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)pObject->Position.y / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)pObject->Position.x / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
01175 
01176       if ( pObject->fFirstTimeMoved )
01177       {
01178             pObject->fFirstTimeMoved = FALSE;
01179             pObject->sFirstGridNo          = sNewGridNo;
01180       }
01181 
01182       // CHECK FOR RANGE< IF INVALID, REMOVE!
01183       if ( sNewGridNo == -1 )
01184       {
01185             PhysicsDeleteObject( pObject );
01186             return( FALSE );
01187       }
01188 
01189       // Look at old gridno
01190       if ( sNewGridNo != pObject->sGridNo || pObject->pNode == NULL )
01191       {
01192             if ( pObject->fVisible )
01193             {
01194                   if ( CheckForCatchObject( pObject ) )
01195                   {
01196                         pObject->fVisible = FALSE;
01197                   }
01198             }
01199 
01200             if ( pObject->fVisible )
01201             {
01202                   // Add smoke trails...
01203 //                if ( pObject->Obj.usItem == MORTAR_SHELL && pObject->uiNumTilesMoved > 2 && pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM )
01204                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 1147"));      
01205 
01206                   if ( Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].usItemClass == IC_BOMB && pObject->uiNumTilesMoved > 2 && pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM )
01207                   {
01208                         if ( sNewGridNo != pObject->sGridNo )
01209                         {
01210                               ANITILE_PARAMS    AniParams;
01211 
01212                               AniParams.sGridNo                                     = (INT16)sNewGridNo;
01213                               AniParams.ubLevelID                                   = ANI_STRUCT_LEVEL;
01214                               AniParams.sDelay                                      = (INT16)( 100 + PreRandom( 100 ) );
01215                               AniParams.sStartFrame                           = 0;
01216                               AniParams.uiFlags                                     = ANITILE_CACHEDTILE | ANITILE_FORWARD | ANITILE_ALWAYS_TRANSLUCENT;
01217                               AniParams.sX                                                      = (INT16)pObject->Position.x;
01218                               AniParams.sY                                                      = (INT16)pObject->Position.y;
01219                               AniParams.sZ                                                      = (INT16)CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( (INT16)pObject->Position.z );
01220 
01221                               strcpy( AniParams.zCachedFile, "TILECACHE\\MSLE_SMK.STI" );
01222 
01223                               CreateAnimationTile( &AniParams );
01224                         }
01225                   }
01226                   else if ( pObject->uiNumTilesMoved > 0 )
01227                   {
01228         if ( sNewGridNo != pObject->sGridNo )
01229         {
01230                           // We're at a new gridno!
01231                           if ( pObject->pNode != NULL )
01232                           {   
01233                                 RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo, pObject->pNode );
01234                           }
01235 
01236                           // We're at a new gridno!
01237                           if ( pObject->pShadow != NULL )
01238                           {   
01239                                 RemoveShadowFromLevelNode( pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo, pObject->pShadow );
01240                           }
01241 
01242                           // Now get graphic index
01243                           sTileIndex = GetTileGraphicForItem( &(Item[ pObject->Obj.usItem ] ) );
01244                           //sTileIndex = BULLETTILE1;
01245 
01246                           // Set new gridno, add
01247                           pNode = AddStructToTail( sNewGridNo, sTileIndex );
01248                           pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
01249                           pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
01250                           pNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS | LEVELNODE_IGNOREHEIGHT | LEVELNODE_PHYSICSOBJECT | LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
01251 
01252                           // Set levelnode
01253                           pObject->pNode = pNode;
01254 
01255                           // Add shadow
01256                           AddShadowToHead( sNewGridNo, sTileIndex );
01257                           pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sNewGridNo ].pShadowHead;
01258                           pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
01259                           pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
01260                           pNode->uiFlags |= ( LEVELNODE_USEABSOLUTEPOS | LEVELNODE_IGNOREHEIGHT | LEVELNODE_PHYSICSOBJECT | LEVELNODE_DYNAMIC );
01261 
01262                           // Set levelnode
01263                           pObject->pShadow = pNode;
01264 
01265           pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo = sNewGridNo;
01266         }
01267                   }
01268             }
01269             else
01270             {
01271                   // Remove!
01272                   if ( pObject->pNode != NULL )
01273                   {     
01274                         RemoveStructFromLevelNode( pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo, pObject->pNode );
01275                   }
01276 
01277                   // We're at a new gridno!
01278                   if ( pObject->pShadow != NULL )
01279                   {     
01280                         RemoveShadowFromLevelNode( pObject->sLevelNodeGridNo, pObject->pShadow );
01281                   }
01282 
01283                   pObject->pNode          = NULL;
01284                   pObject->pShadow  = NULL;
01285             }
01286 
01287     if ( sNewGridNo != pObject->sGridNo )
01288     {
01289               pObject->uiNumTilesMoved++;
01290     }
01291 
01292             pObject->sGridNo = sNewGridNo;
01293 
01294     if ( pObject->fPotentialForDebug )
01295     {
01296           PhysicsDebugMsg( String( "Object %d: uiNumTilesMoved: %d", pObject->iID, pObject->uiNumTilesMoved ) );
01297     }
01298       }
01299 
01300       if ( pObject->fVisible )
01301       {
01302 //          if ( pObject->Obj.usItem != MORTAR_SHELL || pObject->ubActionCode != THROW_ARM_ITEM )
01303             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 1238"));  
01304 
01305             if ( !(Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].usItemClass == IC_BOMB) || pObject->ubActionCode != THROW_ARM_ITEM )
01306             {
01307                   if ( pObject->pNode != NULL )
01308                   {
01309                         // OK, get offsets
01310                         hVObject = gTileDatabase[ pObject->pNode->usIndex ].hTileSurface;
01311                         pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ gTileDatabase[ pObject->pNode->usIndex ].usRegionIndex ] );
01312 
01313                         // Add new object / update position
01314                         // Update position data
01315                         pObject->pNode->sRelativeX    = (INT16)pObject->Position.x; // + pTrav->sOffsetX;
01316                         pObject->pNode->sRelativeY    = (INT16)pObject->Position.y; // + pTrav->sOffsetY;
01317                         pObject->pNode->sRelativeZ    = (INT16)CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( (INT16)pObject->Position.z );
01318 
01319                         // Update position data
01320                         pObject->pShadow->sRelativeX  = (INT16)pObject->Position.x; // + pTrav->sOffsetX;
01321                         pObject->pShadow->sRelativeY  = (INT16)pObject->Position.y; // + pTrav->sOffsetY;
01322                         pObject->pShadow->sRelativeZ  = (INT16)gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].sHeight;                  
01323                   }
01324             }
01325       }
01326 
01327       return( TRUE );
01328 }
01329 
01330

01383 
01384 vector_3 FindBestForceForTrajectory( INT16 sSrcGridNo, INT16 sGridNo,INT16 sStartZ, INT16 sEndZ, real dzDegrees, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT16 *psGridNo, real *pdMagForce )
01385 {
01386       vector_3          vDirNormal, vPosition, vForce;
01387       INT16                   sDestX, sDestY, sSrcX, sSrcY;
01388       real                    dForce            = 20;
01389       real                    dRange;
01390       real                    dPercentDiff = 0;
01391       real                    dTestRange, dTestDiff;
01392       INT32                   iNumChecks = 0;
01393 
01394       // Get XY from gridno
01395       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sDestX, &sDestY );
01396       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sSrcGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
01397 
01398       // Set position
01399       vPosition.x = sSrcX;
01400       vPosition.y = sSrcY;
01401       vPosition.z = sStartZ;
01402 
01403       // OK, get direction normal
01404       vDirNormal.x = (float)(sDestX - sSrcX);
01405       vDirNormal.y = (float)(sDestY - sSrcY);
01406       vDirNormal.z = 0;
01407 
01408       // NOmralize
01409       vDirNormal = VGetNormal( &vDirNormal );
01410 
01411       // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
01412       vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dzDegrees );
01413 
01414       // Get range
01415       dRange = (float)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sGridNo, sSrcGridNo );
01416 
01417       //calculate force needed
01418       {
01419             dForce = (float)( 12 * ( sqrt( ( GRAVITY * dRange ) / sin( 2 * dzDegrees ) ) ) );
01420       }
01421 
01422       do
01423       {
01424             // This first force is just an estimate...
01425             // now di a binary search to find best value....
01426             iNumChecks++;
01427 
01428 
01429             // Now use a force
01430             vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
01431             vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
01432             vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
01433 
01434             dTestRange = CalculateObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, psGridNo );
01435 
01436             // What's the diff?
01437             dTestDiff = dTestRange - dRange;
01438       
01439             // How have we done?
01440             // < 5% off...
01441             if ( fabs( ( dTestDiff / dRange ) ) < .01 )
01442             {
01443                   break;
01444             }
01445 
01446             if ( iNumChecks > MAX_INTEGRATIONS )
01447             {
01448                   break;
01449             }
01450 
01451             // What is the Percentage difference?
01452             dPercentDiff = dForce * ( dTestDiff / dRange );
01453 
01454             // Adjust force accordingly
01455             dForce = dForce - ( ( dPercentDiff ) / 2 ); 
01456 
01457       } while( TRUE );
01458 
01459       // OK, we have our force, calculate change to get through without collide
01460       //if ( ChanceToGetThroughObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, NULL ) == 0 )
01461       {
01462             //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Chance to get through throw is 0." );
01463       }
01464 
01465       if ( pdMagForce )
01466       {
01467             (*pdMagForce) = dForce;
01468       }
01469 
01470 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION 
01471       //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Number of integration: %d", iNumChecks );
01472 #endif
01473 
01474       return( vForce );
01475 }

01478 INT16 FindFinalGridNoGivenDirectionGridNoForceAngle( INT16 sSrcGridNo, INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sStartZ, INT16 sEndZ, real dForce, real dzDegrees, OBJECTTYPE *pItem )
01479 {
01480       vector_3          vDirNormal, vPosition, vForce;
01481       INT16                   sDestX, sDestY, sSrcX, sSrcY;
01482       real                    dRange;
01483       INT16                   sEndGridNo;
01484 
01485 
01486       // Get XY from gridno
01487       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sDestX, &sDestY );
01488       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sSrcGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
01489 
01490       // Set position
01491       vPosition.x = sSrcX;
01492       vPosition.y = sSrcY;
01493       vPosition.z = sStartZ;
01494 
01495       // OK, get direction normal
01496       vDirNormal.x = (float)(sDestX - sSrcX);
01497       vDirNormal.y = (float)(sDestY - sSrcY);
01498       vDirNormal.z = 0;
01499 
01500       // NOmralize
01501       vDirNormal = VGetNormal( &vDirNormal );
01502 
01503       // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
01504       vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dzDegrees );
01505 
01506       // Get range
01507       dRange = (float)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sGridNo, sSrcGridNo );
01508 
01509       // Now use a force
01510       vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
01511       vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
01512       vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
01513 
01514       CalculateObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, &sEndGridNo );
01515 
01516       return( sEndGridNo );
01517 }
