01519 
01520 real FindBestAngleForTrajectory( INT16 sSrcGridNo, INT16 sGridNo,INT16 sStartZ, INT16 sEndZ, real dForce, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT16 *psGridNo )
01521 {
01522       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory");
01523 
01524       vector_3          vDirNormal, vPosition, vForce;
01525       INT16                   sDestX, sDestY, sSrcX, sSrcY;
01526       real                    dRange;
01527       real                    dzDegrees = ( (float)PI/8 );
01528       real                    dPercentDiff = 0;
01529       real                    dTestRange, dTestDiff;
01530       INT32                   iNumChecks = 0;
01531 
01532 
01533       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: get range and direction");
01534       // Get XY from gridno
01535       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sDestX, &sDestY );
01536       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sSrcGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
01537 
01538       // Set position
01539       vPosition.x = sSrcX;
01540       vPosition.y = sSrcY;
01541       vPosition.z = sStartZ;
01542 
01543       // OK, get direction normal
01544       vDirNormal.x = (float)(sDestX - sSrcX);
01545       vDirNormal.y = (float)(sDestY - sSrcY);
01546       vDirNormal.z = 0;
01547 
01548       // NOmralize
01549       vDirNormal = VGetNormal( &vDirNormal );
01550 
01551       // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
01552       vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dzDegrees );
01553 
01554       // Get range
01555       dRange = (float)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( sGridNo, sSrcGridNo );
01556 
01557       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: find best direction");
01558       do
01559       {
01560             // This first direction is just an estimate...
01561             // now do a binary search to find best value....
01562             iNumChecks++;
01563 
01564             // Now use a force
01565             vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
01566             vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
01567             vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
01568 
01569             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: CalculateObjectTrajectory");
01570             dTestRange = CalculateObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, psGridNo );
01571 
01572             // What's the diff?
01573             dTestDiff = dTestRange - dRange;
01574       
01575             // How have we done?
01576             // < 5% off...
01577             if ( fabs( (FLOAT)( dTestDiff / dRange ) ) < .05 )
01578             {
01579                   break;
01580             }
01581 
01582             if ( iNumChecks > MAX_INTEGRATIONS )
01583             {
01584                   break;
01585             }
01586 
01587             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: get percentage difference");
01588             // What is the Percentage difference?
01589             dPercentDiff = dzDegrees * ( dTestDiff / dRange );
01590 
01591             // Adjust degrees accordingly
01592             dzDegrees = dzDegrees - ( dPercentDiff / 2 );
01593 
01594             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: check angle");
01595             // OK, If our angle is too far either way, giveup!
01596             if ( fabs( dzDegrees ) >= ( PI / 2 ) || fabs( dzDegrees ) <= 0.005 )
01597             {
01598                   // Use 0.....
01599                   dzDegrees = 0;
01600                   // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
01601                   vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dzDegrees );
01602                   // Now use a force
01603                   vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
01604                   vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
01605                   vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
01606                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: giving up CalculateObjectTrajectory");
01607                   dTestRange = CalculateObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, psGridNo );
01608                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory: giving up returning 0");
01609                   return( (FLOAT)( dzDegrees ) );
01610             }
01611 
01612 
01613             // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
01614             vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dzDegrees );
01615 
01616       } while( TRUE );
01617 
01618       // OK, we have our force, calculate change to get through without collide
01619       //if ( ChanceToGetThroughObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce ) == 0 )
01620       //{
01621       //    ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Chance to get through throw is 0." );
01622       //}
01623 
01624       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FindBestAngleForTrajectory done");
01625       return( dzDegrees );
01626 }
01627 
01628 
01629 void FindTrajectory( INT16 sSrcGridNo, INT16 sGridNo, INT16 sStartZ, INT16 sEndZ, real dForce, real dzDegrees, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT16 *psGridNo )
01630 {
01631       vector_3          vDirNormal, vPosition, vForce;
01632       INT16                   sDestX, sDestY, sSrcX, sSrcY;
01633 
01634       // Get XY from gridno
01635       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sDestX, &sDestY );
01636       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sSrcGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
01637 
01638       // Set position
01639       vPosition.x = sSrcX;
01640       vPosition.y = sSrcY;
01641       vPosition.z = sStartZ;
01642 
01643       // OK, get direction normal
01644       vDirNormal.x = (float)(sDestX - sSrcX);
01645       vDirNormal.y = (float)(sDestY - sSrcY);
01646       vDirNormal.z = 0;
01647 
01648       // NOmralize
01649       vDirNormal = VGetNormal( &vDirNormal );
01650 
01651       // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
01652       vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dzDegrees );
01653 
01654       // Now use a force
01655       vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
01656       vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
01657       vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
01658 
01659       CalculateObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, psGridNo );
01660 }
01661 
01662 
01663 
01664 // OK, this will, given a target Z, INVTYPE, source, target gridnos, initial force vector, will
01665 // return range
01666 
01667 FLOAT CalculateObjectTrajectory( INT16 sTargetZ, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, vector_3 *vPosition, vector_3 *vForce, INT16 *psFinalGridNo )
01668 {
01669       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateObjectTrajectory");
01670       INT32 iID;
01671       REAL_OBJECT *pObject;
01672       FLOAT dDiffX, dDiffY;
01673       INT16 sGridNo;
01674       //int cnt=0;
01675 
01676       if ( psFinalGridNo )
01677       {
01678             (*psFinalGridNo) = NOWHERE;
01679       }
01680 
01681 
01682       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateObjectTrajectory: createphysicalobject");
01683       // OK, create a physics object....
01684       iID = CreatePhysicalObject( pItem, -1, vPosition->x, vPosition->y, vPosition->z, vForce->x, vForce->y, vForce->z, NOBODY, NO_THROW_ACTION, 0 );
01685 
01686       if ( iID == -1 )
01687       {
01688             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateObjectTrajectory: returning -1");
01689             return( -1 );
01690       }
01691 
01692       pObject = &( ObjectSlots[ iID ] );
01693 
01694       // Set some special values...
01695       pObject->fTestObject = TEST_OBJECT_NO_COLLISIONS;
01696       pObject->TestZTarget = sTargetZ;
01697       pObject->fTestPositionNotSet = TRUE;
01698       pObject->fVisible        = FALSE;
01699 
01700       // WANNE 2
01701       // Alrighty, move this beast until it dies....
01702       while( pObject->fAlive )
01703       {
01704             //cnt = cnt + 1;
01705             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateObjectTrajectory: calling simulateobject - this object never fucking dies!!!!");
01706             SimulateObject( pObject, (float)DELTA_T );
01707       }
01708 
01709       // Calculate gridno from last position
01710       sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)pObject->Position.y / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)pObject->Position.x / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
01711 
01712       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateObjectTrajectory: physicsdeleteobject");
01713       PhysicsDeleteObject( pObject );
01714 
01715       // get new x, y, z values
01716       dDiffX = ( pObject->TestTargetPosition.x - vPosition->x );
01717       dDiffY = ( pObject->TestTargetPosition.y - vPosition->y );
01718 
01719       if ( psFinalGridNo )
01720       {
01721             (*psFinalGridNo) = sGridNo;
01722       }
01723 
01724       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateObjectTrajectory: done");
01725       return( (FLOAT)sqrt( ( dDiffX * dDiffX ) + ( dDiffY * dDiffY ) ) );
01726       
01727 }
01728 
01729 
01730 INT32 ChanceToGetThroughObjectTrajectory( INT16 sTargetZ, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, vector_3 *vPosition, vector_3 *vForce, INT16 *psNewGridNo, INT8 *pbLevel, BOOLEAN fFromUI )
01731 {
01732       INT32 iID;
01733       REAL_OBJECT *pObject;
01734 
01735       // OK, create a physics object....
01736       iID = CreatePhysicalObject( pItem, -1, vPosition->x, vPosition->y, vPosition->z, vForce->x, vForce->y, vForce->z, NOBODY, NO_THROW_ACTION, 0 );
01737 
01738       if ( iID == -1 )
01739       {
01740             return( -1 );
01741       }
01742 
01743       pObject = &( ObjectSlots[ iID ] );
01744 
01745       // Set some special values...
01746       pObject->fTestObject = TEST_OBJECT_NOTWALLROOF_COLLISIONS;
01747       pObject->fTestPositionNotSet = TRUE;
01748       pObject->TestZTarget = sTargetZ;
01749       pObject->fVisible        = FALSE;
01750   //pObject->fPotentialForDebug = TRUE;
01751 
01752       // Alrighty, move this beast until it dies....
01753       while( pObject->fAlive )
01754       {
01755             SimulateObject( pObject, (float)DELTA_T );
01756       }
01757 
01758 
01759       if ( psNewGridNo != NULL )
01760       {
01761     // Calculate gridno from last position
01762 
01763     // If NOT from UI, use exact collision position
01764             // JA25 comment from CJC:  testing breaklights, we ran into a situation where EndedWithCollisionPosition was not
01765             // set due to breaklight stopping on flat ground.  It makes sense that if EndedWithCollisionPosition is
01766             // unset, at least the Position value is of SOME use...
01767     if ( fFromUI || (pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition.x == 0.0f && pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition.y == 0.0f) )
01768     {
01769               (*psNewGridNo) = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)pObject->Position.y / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)pObject->Position.x / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
01770     }
01771     else
01772     {
01773               (*psNewGridNo) = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( ( (INT16)pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition.y / CELL_Y_SIZE ), ( (INT16)pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition.x / CELL_X_SIZE ) );
01774     }
01775 
01776             (*pbLevel) = GET_OBJECT_LEVEL( pObject->EndedWithCollisionPosition.z - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ (*psNewGridNo) ].sHeight ) );
01777       }
01778 
01779       PhysicsDeleteObject( pObject );
01780 
01781       // See If we collided
01782       if ( pObject->fTestEndedWithCollision )
01783       {
01784             return( 0 );
01785       }
01786       return( 100 );
01787       
01788 }
01789 
01790 
01791 
01792 
01793 FLOAT CalculateLaunchItemAngle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubHeight, real dForce, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT16 *psGridNo )
01794 {
01795       real                    dAngle;
01796       INT16                   sSrcX, sSrcY;
01797 
01798       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
01799 
01800       dAngle = FindBestAngleForTrajectory( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo, GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel ), ubHeight, dForce, pItem, psGridNo );
01801 
01802       // new we have defaut angle value...
01803       return( dAngle );
01804 }
01805 
01806 
01807 
01808 void CalculateLaunchItemBasicParams( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel, INT16 sEndZ,  FLOAT *pdMagForce, FLOAT *pdDegrees, INT16 *psFinalGridNo, BOOLEAN fArmed )
01809 {
01810       INT16       sInterGridNo;
01811       INT16       sStartZ;
01812       FLOAT       dMagForce, dMaxForce, dMinForce;
01813       FLOAT       dDegrees, dNewDegrees;
01814       BOOLEAN     fThroughIntermediateGridNo = FALSE;
01815       UINT16      usLauncher;
01816       BOOLEAN     fIndoors = FALSE;
01817       BOOLEAN     fLauncher = FALSE;
01818       BOOLEAN     fMortar           = FALSE;
01819       BOOLEAN     fGLauncher = FALSE;
01820       INT16       sMinRange = 0;
01821 
01822       // Start with default degrees/ force
01823       dDegrees = OUTDOORS_START_ANGLE;
01824       sStartZ      = GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel );
01825 
01826       // Are we armed, and are we throwing a LAUNCHABLE?
01827 
01828       usLauncher = GetLauncherFromLaunchable( pItem->usItem );
01829 DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 1741"));  
01830       if ( fArmed && ( Item[usLauncher].mortar || Item[pItem->usItem].mortar ) )
01831       {
01832              // Start at 0....
01833              sStartZ = ( pSoldier->bLevel * 256 );
01834              fMortar = TRUE;
01835              sMinRange = MIN_MORTAR_RANGE;
01836              //fLauncher = TRUE;
01837       }
01838 DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 1750"));  
01839       
01840       if ( fArmed && ( Item[usLauncher].grenadelauncher || Item[pItem->usItem].grenadelauncher ) )
01841       {
01842             // OK, look at target level and decide angle to use...
01843             if ( ubLevel == 1 )
01844             {
01845                   dDegrees  = GLAUNCHER_HIGHER_LEVEL_START_ANGLE;
01846             }
01847             else
01848             {
01849                   dDegrees  = GLAUNCHER_START_ANGLE;
01850             }
01851             fGLauncher = TRUE;
01852             sMinRange    = MIN_MORTAR_RANGE/2;
01853 
01854             if ( (gGameSettings.fOptions[TOPTION_GL_HIGH_ANGLE] && pSoldier->bTeam == OUR_TEAM) || ( pSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel >= DIF_LEVEL_HARD ) )
01855                   dDegrees *= 2;
01856             //fLauncher = TRUE;
01857       }
01858 
01859       // CHANGE DEGREE VALUES BASED ON IF WE ARE INSIDE, ETC
01860       // ARE WE INSIDE?
01861 
01862       if ( gfCaves || gfBasement  )
01863       {
01864             // Adjust angle....
01865             dDegrees = INDOORS_START_ANGLE;
01866             fIndoors = TRUE;
01867       }
01868 
01869       if ( ( IsRoofPresentAtGridno( pSoldier->sGridNo ) ) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
01870       {
01871             // Adjust angle....
01872             dDegrees = INDOORS_START_ANGLE;
01873             fIndoors = TRUE;
01874       }
01875 
01876       // IS OUR TARGET INSIDE?
01877       if ( IsRoofPresentAtGridno( sGridNo ) && ubLevel == 0 )
01878       {
01879             // Adjust angle....
01880             dDegrees = INDOORS_START_ANGLE;
01881             fIndoors = TRUE;
01882       }
01883 
01884 
01885       // OK, look if we can go through a windows here...
01886       if ( ubLevel == 0 )
01887       {
01888             sInterGridNo = SoldierToLocationWindowTest( pSoldier, sGridNo );
01889 
01890             // Lesh: fixing nasty freeze when throwing item through window
01891             // sometimes SoldierToLocationWindowTest returns same value as pSoldier->sGridNo
01892             // this leads to fault in FindBestAngleForTrajectory function and it subroutines loops
01893             // supplied by invalid data
01894             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sInterGridNo )
01895             {
01896                   // bad news - i can't throw item at myself
01897                   // so use dir incrementer
01898                   UINT8 ubDir = atan8( CenterX(pSoldier->sGridNo), CenterY(pSoldier->sGridNo), CenterX(sGridNo), CenterY(sGridNo) );
01899                   sInterGridNo += DirIncrementer[ubDir];
01900             }
01901       }
01902       else
01903       {
01904             sInterGridNo = NOWHERE;
01905       }
01906 
01907       if ( sInterGridNo != NOWHERE )
01908       {
01909              // IF so, adjust target height, gridno....
01910              ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Through a window!" );
01911 
01912              fThroughIntermediateGridNo = TRUE;
01913       }
01914 
01915       if ( !fLauncher )
01916       {
01917             // Find force for basic
01918             FindBestForceForTrajectory( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo, sStartZ, sEndZ, dDegrees, pItem, psFinalGridNo, &dMagForce );
01919 
01920             // Adjust due to max range....
01921             dMaxForce   = CalculateSoldierMaxForce( pSoldier, dDegrees, pItem, fArmed );
01922 
01923             if ( fIndoors )
01924             {
01925                   dMaxForce = dMaxForce * 2;
01926             }
01927 
01928             if ( dMagForce > dMaxForce )
01929             {
01930                   dMagForce = dMaxForce;
01931             }
01932 
01933             // ATE: If we are a mortar, make sure we are at min.
01934             if ( fMortar || fGLauncher )
01935             {
01936                   // find min force
01937                   dMinForce = CalculateForceFromRange( (INT16)( sMinRange / 10 ), (FLOAT)( PI / 4 ) );
01938 
01939                   if ( dMagForce < dMinForce )
01940                   {
01941                         dMagForce = dMinForce;
01942                   }
01943             }
01944 
01945             if ( fThroughIntermediateGridNo )
01946             {
01947                   // Given this power, now try and go through this window....
01948                   dDegrees = FindBestAngleForTrajectory( pSoldier->sGridNo, sInterGridNo, GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel ), 150, dMagForce, pItem, psFinalGridNo );           
01949             }
01950       }
01951       else
01952       {
01953             // Use MAX force, vary angle....
01954             dMagForce   = CalculateSoldierMaxForce( pSoldier, dDegrees, pItem, fArmed );
01955 
01956             if ( ubLevel == 0 )
01957             {
01958                   dMagForce         =     (float)( dMagForce * 1.25 );
01959             }
01960             
01961             FindTrajectory( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo, sStartZ, sEndZ, dMagForce, dDegrees, pItem, psFinalGridNo );
01962 
01963             if ( ubLevel == 1 && !fThroughIntermediateGridNo )
01964             {
01965                   // Is there a guy here...?
01966                   if ( WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, ubLevel ) != NO_SOLDIER )
01967                   {
01968                         dMagForce         =     (float)( dMagForce * 0.85 );
01969 
01970                         // Yep, try to get angle...
01971                          dNewDegrees = FindBestAngleForTrajectory( pSoldier->sGridNo, sGridNo, GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel ), 150, dMagForce, pItem, psFinalGridNo );            
01972 
01973                          if ( dNewDegrees != 0 )
01974                          {
01975                                     dDegrees = dNewDegrees;
01976                          }
01977                   }
01978             }
01979 
01980             if ( fThroughIntermediateGridNo )
01981             {
01982                   dDegrees = FindBestAngleForTrajectory( pSoldier->sGridNo, sInterGridNo, GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel ), 150, dMagForce, pItem, psFinalGridNo );           
01983             }
01984       }
01985 
01986 
01987       (*pdMagForce) = dMagForce;
01988       (*pdDegrees )     = dDegrees;
01989 }
01990 
01991 
01992 BOOLEAN CalculateLaunchItemChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel, INT16 sEndZ,  INT16 *psFinalGridNo, BOOLEAN fArmed, INT8 *pbLevel, BOOLEAN fFromUI )
01993 {
01994       FLOAT                   dForce, dDegrees; 
01995       INT16                   sDestX, sDestY, sSrcX, sSrcY;
01996       vector_3          vForce, vPosition, vDirNormal;
01997 
01998       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateLaunchItemChanceToGetThrough");
01999       // Ge7t basic launch params...
02000       CalculateLaunchItemBasicParams( pSoldier, pItem, sGridNo, ubLevel, sEndZ, &dForce, &dDegrees, psFinalGridNo, fArmed );
02001 
02002       // Get XY from gridno
02003       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sDestX, &sDestY );
02004       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
02005 
02006       // Set position
02007       vPosition.x = sSrcX;
02008       vPosition.y = sSrcY;
02009       vPosition.z = GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel );
02010 
02011       // OK, get direction normal
02012       vDirNormal.x = (float)(sDestX - sSrcX);
02013       vDirNormal.y = (float)(sDestY - sSrcY);
02014       vDirNormal.z = 0;
02015 
02016       // NOmralize
02017       vDirNormal = VGetNormal( &vDirNormal );
02018 
02019       // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
02020       vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dDegrees );
02021 
02022       // Do force....
02023       vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
02024       vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
02025       vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
02026 
02027       // OK, we have our force, calculate change to get through without collide
02028       if ( ChanceToGetThroughObjectTrajectory( sEndZ, pItem, &vPosition, &vForce, psFinalGridNo, pbLevel, fFromUI ) == 0 )
02029       {
02030             return( FALSE );
02031       }
02032 
02033       if ( (*pbLevel) != ubLevel )
02034       {
02035             return( FALSE );
02036       }
02037 
02038   if ( !fFromUI && (*psFinalGridNo) != sGridNo )
02039   {
02040     return( FALSE );
02041   }
02042 
02043       return( TRUE );
02044 }
02045 
02046 
02047 
02048 FLOAT CalculateForceFromRange( INT16 sRange, FLOAT dDegrees )
02049 {
02050       FLOAT                   dMagForce;
02051       INT16                   sSrcGridNo, sDestGridNo;
02052       OBJECTTYPE  Object;
02053       INT16                   sFinalGridNo;
02054 
02055       // OK, use a fake gridno, find the new gridno based on range, use height of merc, end height of ground,
02056       // 45 degrees
02057       sSrcGridNo  = 4408;
02058       sDestGridNo = 4408 + ( sRange * WORLD_COLS );
02059 
02060       // Use a grenade objecttype
02061       CreateItem( HAND_GRENADE, 100, &Object );
02062 
02063       FindBestForceForTrajectory( sSrcGridNo, sDestGridNo, GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( 0 ), 0, dDegrees, &Object, &sFinalGridNo, &dMagForce );
02064 
02065       return( dMagForce );
02066 }
02067 
02068 
02069 FLOAT CalculateSoldierMaxForce( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, FLOAT dDegrees , OBJECTTYPE *pItem , BOOLEAN fArmed )
02070 {
02071       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateSoldierMaxForce");
02072 
02073       INT32 uiMaxRange;
02074       FLOAT dMagForce;
02075       
02076       dDegrees = (FLOAT)( PI/4 );
02077 
02078       uiMaxRange = CalcMaxTossRange( pSoldier, pItem->usItem, fArmed );
02079 
02080       dMagForce = CalculateForceFromRange( (INT16) uiMaxRange, dDegrees );
02081 
02082       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateSoldierMaxForce: done");
02083       return( dMagForce );
02084 }
02085 
02086 
02087 #define MAX_MISS_BY               30
02088 #define MIN_MISS_BY               1
02089 #define MAX_MISS_RADIUS   5
02090 
02091 void CalculateLaunchItemParamsForThrow( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubLevel, INT16 sEndZ, OBJECTTYPE *pItem, INT8 bMissBy, UINT8 ubActionCode, UINT32 uiActionData )
02092 {
02093       FLOAT                   dForce, dDegrees; 
02094       INT16                   sDestX, sDestY, sSrcX, sSrcY;
02095       vector_3          vForce, vDirNormal;
02096       INT16                   sFinalGridNo;
02097       BOOLEAN                 fArmed = FALSE;
02098       UINT16                  usLauncher;
02099       INT16                   sStartZ;
02100   INT8        bMinMissRadius, bMaxMissRadius, bMaxRadius;
02101   FLOAT       fScale;
02102 
02103       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateLaunchItemParamsForThrow");
02104 
02105       // Set target ID if anyone
02106       pSoldier->ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, ubLevel );
02107 
02108       if ( ubActionCode == THROW_ARM_ITEM )
02109       {
02110             fArmed = TRUE;
02111       }
02112 
02113       if ( bMissBy < 0 )
02114       {
02115             // then we hit!
02116             bMissBy = 0;
02117       }
02118 
02119   //if ( 0 )
02120       if ( bMissBy > 0 )
02121       {
02122              // Max the miss variance
02123             if ( bMissBy > MAX_MISS_BY )
02124             {
02125                   bMissBy = MAX_MISS_BY;
02126             }
02127 
02128             // Min the miss varience...
02129             if ( bMissBy < MIN_MISS_BY )
02130             {
02131                   bMissBy = MIN_MISS_BY;
02132             }
02133 
02134             // Adjust position, force, angle
02135 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02136             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Throw miss by: %d", bMissBy );
02137 #endif
02138 
02139     // Default to max radius...
02140     bMaxRadius = 5;
02141 
02142     // scale if pyth spaces away is too far
02143     if ( PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) < ( (float)bMaxRadius / (float)1.5 ) )
02144     {
02145       bMaxRadius = PythSpacesAway( sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) / 2;
02146     }
02147 
02148 
02149     // Get radius
02150     fScale = ( (float)bMissBy / (float) MAX_MISS_BY );
02151 
02152     bMaxMissRadius = (INT8)( bMaxRadius * fScale );
02153 
02154     // Limit max radius...
02155     if ( bMaxMissRadius > 4 )
02156     {
02157       bMaxMissRadius = 4;
02158     }
02159 
02160 
02161     bMinMissRadius = bMaxMissRadius - 1;
02162 
02163     if ( bMinMissRadius < 2 )
02164     {
02165       bMinMissRadius = 2;
02166     }
02167 
02168     if ( bMaxMissRadius < bMinMissRadius )
02169     {
02170       bMaxMissRadius = bMinMissRadius;
02171     }
02172 
02173     sGridNo = RandomGridFromRadius( sGridNo, bMinMissRadius, bMaxMissRadius );
02174       }
02175   
02176       // Get basic launch params...
02177       CalculateLaunchItemBasicParams( pSoldier, pItem, sGridNo, ubLevel, sEndZ, &dForce, &dDegrees, &sFinalGridNo, fArmed );
02178 
02179       // Get XY from gridno
02180       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sDestX, &sDestY );
02181       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sSrcX, &sSrcY );
02182 
02183       // OK, get direction normal
02184       vDirNormal.x = (float)(sDestX - sSrcX);
02185       vDirNormal.y = (float)(sDestY - sSrcY);
02186       vDirNormal.z = 0;
02187 
02188       // NOmralize
02189       vDirNormal = VGetNormal( &vDirNormal );
02190 
02191       // From degrees, calculate Z portion of normal
02192       vDirNormal.z      = (float)sin( dDegrees );
02193 
02194       // Do force....
02195       vForce.x = dForce * vDirNormal.x;
02196       vForce.y = dForce * vDirNormal.y;
02197       vForce.z = dForce * vDirNormal.z;
02198 
02199 
02200       // Allocate Throw Parameters
02201       pSoldier->pThrowParams = (THROW_PARAMS *) MemAlloc( sizeof( THROW_PARAMS ) );
02202       memset( pSoldier->pThrowParams, 0, sizeof( THROW_PARAMS ) );
02203 
02204       pSoldier->pTempObject    = (OBJECTTYPE *) MemAlloc( sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02205 
02206       memcpy( pSoldier->pTempObject, pItem, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
02207       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dX = (float)sSrcX;
02208       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dY = (float)sSrcY;
02209 
02210 
02211       sStartZ = GET_SOLDIER_THROW_HEIGHT( pSoldier->bLevel );
02212       usLauncher = GetLauncherFromLaunchable( pItem->usItem );
02213 DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 2103"));  
02214 
02215       if ( fArmed && Item[usLauncher].mortar )
02216       {
02217              // Start at 0....
02218              sStartZ = ( pSoldier->bLevel * 256 ) + 50;
02219       }
02220 
02221       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dZ = (float)sStartZ;
02222       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dForceX = vForce.x;
02223       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dForceY = vForce.y;
02224       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dForceZ = vForce.z;
02225       pSoldier->pThrowParams->dLifeSpan = -1;
02226       pSoldier->pThrowParams->ubActionCode = ubActionCode;
02227       pSoldier->pThrowParams->uiActionData = uiActionData;
02228 
02229       // Dirty interface
02230       DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
02231 
02232       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CalculateLaunchItemParamsForThrow done");
02233 }
02234 
02235 
02236 BOOLEAN CheckForCatcher( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, UINT16 usStructureID )
02237 {
02238       // Do we want to catch?
02239       if ( pObject->fTestObject ==  NO_TEST_OBJECT )
02240       {
02241             if ( pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_TARGET_MERC_CATCH )
02242             {
02243                   // Is it a guy?
02244                   if ( usStructureID < INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID )
02245                   {
02246                         //Is it the same guy?
02247                         if ( usStructureID == pObject->uiActionData )               
02248                         {
02249                               if ( DoCatchObject( pObject ) )
02250                               {
02251                                     pObject->fAlive = FALSE;
02252                                     return( TRUE );
02253                               }
02254                         }
02255                   }
02256             }
02257       }
02258       return( FALSE );
02259 }
02260 
02261 
02262 void CheckForObjectHittingMerc( REAL_OBJECT *pObject, UINT16 usStructureID )
02263 {
02264       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02265   INT16       sDamage, sBreath;
02266 
02267       // Do we want to catch?
02268       if ( pObject->fTestObject ==  NO_TEST_OBJECT )
02269       {
02270             // Is it a guy?
02271             if ( usStructureID < INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID )
02272             {
02273       if ( pObject->ubLastTargetTakenDamage != (UINT8)usStructureID )
02274       {
02275                     pSoldier = MercPtrs[ usStructureID ];
02276 
02277         sDamage = 1;
02278         sBreath = 0;
02279 
02280         EVENT_SoldierGotHit( pSoldier, NOTHING, sDamage, sBreath, pSoldier->bDirection, 0, pObject->ubOwner, FIRE_WEAPON_TOSSED_OBJECT_SPECIAL, 0, 0, NOWHERE );
02281 
02282         pObject->ubLastTargetTakenDamage = (UINT8)( usStructureID );
02283       }
02284             }
02285       }
02286 }
02287 
02288 
02289 BOOLEAN CheckForCatchObject( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
02290 {
02291       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02292       UINT32                  uiSpacesAway;
02293 
02294       // Do we want to catch?
02295       if ( pObject->fTestObject ==  NO_TEST_OBJECT )
02296       {
02297             if ( pObject->ubActionCode == THROW_TARGET_MERC_CATCH )
02298             {
02299                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pObject->uiActionData ];
02300 
02301                   // Is it a guy?
02302                   // Are we close to this guy?
02303                   uiSpacesAway = PythSpacesAway( pObject->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo );
02304 
02305                   if ( uiSpacesAway < 4 && !pObject->fAttemptedCatch )
02306                   {
02307                          if ( pSoldier->usAnimState != CATCH_STANDING && 
02308                                           pSoldier->usAnimState != CATCH_CROUCHED && 
02309                                           pSoldier->usAnimState != LOWER_RIFLE )                                        
02310                          {
02311                               if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_STAND )
02312                               {
02313                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CATCH_STANDING, 0 , FALSE );
02314                               }     
02315                               else if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight == ANIM_CROUCH )
02316                               {
02317                                     EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, CATCH_CROUCHED, 0 , FALSE );
02318                               }
02319 
02320                               pObject->fCatchAnimOn = TRUE;
02321                          }
02322                   }
02323 
02324                   pObject->fAttemptedCatch = TRUE;
02325 
02326                   if ( uiSpacesAway <= 1 && !pObject->fCatchCheckDone )
02327                   {
02328                         if ( AttemptToCatchObject( pObject ) )
02329                         {
02330                               return( TRUE );
02331                         }
02332                   }
02333             }
02334       }
02335       return( FALSE );
02336 }
02337 
02338 
02339 
02340 
02341 BOOLEAN AttemptToCatchObject( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
02342 {
02343       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02344       UINT8                   ubChanceToCatch;
02345 
02346       // Get intended target
02347       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pObject->uiActionData ];
02348 
02349       // OK, get chance to catch
02350       // base it on...? CC? Dexterity?
02351       ubChanceToCatch = 50 + EffectiveDexterity( pSoldier ) / 2;
02352 
02353 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
02354       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Chance To Catch: %d", ubChanceToCatch );
02355 #endif
02356 
02357       pObject->fCatchCheckDone = TRUE;
02358 
02359       if ( PreRandom( 100 ) > ubChanceToCatch )
02360       {
02361             return( FALSE );
02362       }
02363 
02364       pObject->fCatchGood = TRUE;
02365 
02366       return( TRUE );
02367 }
02368 
02369 
02370 BOOLEAN DoCatchObject( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
02371 {
02372       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02373       BOOLEAN                 fGoodCatch = FALSE;
02374       UINT16                  usItem;
02375 
02376       // Get intended target
02377       pSoldier = MercPtrs[ pObject->uiActionData ];
02378 
02379       // Catch anim.....
02380       switch( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight )
02381       {
02382             case ANIM_STAND:
02383 
02384                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
02385                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_CATCH, 0 , FALSE );
02386                   break;
02387 
02388             case ANIM_CROUCH:
02389 
02390                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
02391                   EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, END_CROUCH_CATCH, 0 , FALSE );
02392                   break;
02393       }
02394 
02395       PlayJA2Sample( CATCH_OBJECT, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( MIDVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ) );                 
02396 
02397       pObject->fCatchAnimOn = FALSE;
02398 
02399       if ( !pObject->fCatchGood )
02400       {
02401             return( FALSE );
02402       }
02403 
02404       // Get item
02405       usItem = pObject->Obj.usItem;
02406 
02407       // Transfer object
02408       fGoodCatch = AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, &(pObject->Obj), TRUE );
02409 
02410       // Report success....
02411       if ( fGoodCatch )
02412       {
02413             pObject->fDropItem = FALSE;
02414 
02415             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_MERC_CAUGHT_ITEM ], pSoldier->name, ShortItemNames[ usItem ] );            
02416       }
02417 
02418       return( TRUE );
02419 }

02421 
02422 //#define TESTDUDEXPLOSIVES 
02423 
02424 void HandleArmedObjectImpact( REAL_OBJECT *pObject )
02425 {
02426       INT16                   sZ;
02427       BOOLEAN                 fDoImpact = FALSE;
02428       BOOLEAN                 fCheckForDuds = FALSE;
02429       OBJECTTYPE  *pObj;
02430       INT32                   iTrapped = 0;
02431       UINT16                  usFlags = 0;
02432       INT8                    bLevel = 0;
02433 
02434       // Calculate pixel position of z
02435       sZ = (INT16)CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( (INT16)( pObject->Position.z ) ) - gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].sHeight;
02436 
02437       // get OBJECTTYPE
02438       pObj = &(pObject->Obj);
02439 
02440   // ATE: Make sure number of objects is 1...
02441   pObj->ubNumberOfObjects = 1;
02442 
02443       if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GRENADE )
02444       {
02445             fCheckForDuds = TRUE;
02446       }
02447 
02448 //    if ( pObj->usItem == MORTAR_SHELL )
02449 DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("physics.cpp line 2337"));  
02450 
02451       if (Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass == IC_BOMB)
02452       {
02453             fCheckForDuds = TRUE;
02454       }
02455 
02456       if ( Item[ pObj->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_THROWN  )
02457       {
02458             AddItemToPool( pObject->sGridNo, pObj, INVISIBLE, bLevel, usFlags, 0 );
02459       }
02460 
02461       if ( fCheckForDuds )
02462       {
02463             // If we landed on anything other than the floor, always! go off...
02464       #ifdef TESTDUDEXPLOSIVES 
02465             if ( sZ != 0 || pObject->fInWater )
02466       #else
02467             if ( sZ != 0 || pObject->fInWater || ( pObj->bStatus[0] >= USABLE && ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32) pObj->bStatus[0] + PreRandom( 50 ) ) ) )
02468       #endif
02469             {
02470                   fDoImpact = TRUE;
02471             }
02472             else  // didn't go off!
02473             {
02474       #ifdef TESTDUDEXPLOSIVES 
02475                   if ( 1 )          
02476       #else
02477                   if ( pObj->bStatus[0] >= USABLE && PreRandom(100) < (UINT32) pObj->bStatus[0] + PreRandom( 50 ) )
02478       #endif
02479                   {
02480                         iTrapped = PreRandom( 4 ) + 2;
02481                   }
02482 
02483                   if ( iTrapped )
02484                   {
02485                         // Start timed bomb...
02486                         usFlags |= WORLD_ITEM_ARMED_BOMB;
02487 
02488                         pObj->bDetonatorType = BOMB_TIMED;
02489                         pObj->bDelay = (INT8)( 1 + PreRandom( 2 ) );
02490                   }
02491 
02492                   // ATE: If we have collided with roof last...
02493                   if ( pObject->iOldCollisionCode == COLLISION_ROOF )
02494                   {
02495                         bLevel = 1;
02496                   }
02497 
02498                   // Add item to pool....
02499                   AddItemToPool( pObject->sGridNo, pObj, INVISIBLE, bLevel, usFlags, 0 );
02500 
02501                   // All teams lok for this...
02502                   NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
02503 
02504                   if ( pObject->ubOwner != NOBODY )
02505                   {
02506                         DoMercBattleSound( MercPtrs[ pObject->ubOwner ], (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 ) );
02507                   }
02508             }
02509       }
02510       else
02511       {
02512             fDoImpact = TRUE;
02513       }
02514 
02515       if ( fDoImpact )
02516       {
02517             if ( Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].flare )
02518             {
02519                   //if the light object will ber created OFF the ground
02520                   if( pObject->Position.z > 0 && FindBuilding(pObject->sGridNo) )
02521                   {
02522                         //we cannot create the light source above the ground, or on a roof.  The system doesnt support it.
02523                         AddItemToPool( pObject->sGridNo, &( pObject->Obj ), 1, 1, 0, -1 );
02524                   }
02525                   else
02526                   {
02527                         // Add a light effect...
02528                         
02529                         NewLightEffect( pObject->sGridNo, (UINT8)Explosive[Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].ubClassIndex].ubDuration , (UINT8)Explosive[Item[pObject->Obj.usItem].ubClassIndex].ubStartRadius );
02530                   }
02531             }
02532             else if ( Item[ pObject->Obj.usItem ].usItemClass & IC_GRENADE  )
02533             {
02534 /* ARM: Removed.  Rewards even missed throws, and pulling a pin doesn't really teach anything about explosives
02535                   if ( MercPtrs[ pObject->ubOwner ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
02536                   {
02537                         // tossed grenade, not a dud, so grant xp
02538                         // EXPLOSIVES GAIN (10):  Tossing grenade
02539         if ( pObject->ubOwner != NOBODY )
02540         {
02541                           StatChange( MercPtrs[ pObject->ubOwner ], EXPLODEAMT, 10, FALSE );
02542         }
02543                   }
02544 */
02545 
02546                   IgniteExplosion( pObject->ubOwner, (INT16)pObject->Position.x, (INT16)pObject->Position.y, sZ, pObject->sGridNo, pObject->Obj.usItem, GET_OBJECT_LEVEL( pObject->Position.z - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].sHeight ) ) );
02547             }
02548             else if ( Item[ pObject->Obj.usItem ].usItemClass == IC_BOMB  ) //if ( pObject->Obj.usItem == MORTAR_SHELL )
02549             {
02550                   sZ = (INT16)CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( (INT16)pObject->Position.z );
02551 
02552                   IgniteExplosion( pObject->ubOwner, (INT16)pObject->Position.x, (INT16)pObject->Position.y, sZ, pObject->sGridNo, pObject->Obj.usItem, GET_OBJECT_LEVEL( pObject->Position.z - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ pObject->sGridNo ].sHeight ) ) );
02553             }
02554       }
02555 
02556 }

02558 
02559 
02560 BOOLEAN     SavePhysicsTableToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
02561 {
02562       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
02563       UINT16      usCnt=0;
02564       UINT32      usPhysicsCount=0;
02565 
02566       for( usCnt=0; usCnt<NUM_OBJECT_SLOTS; usCnt++ )
02567       {
02568             //if the REAL_OBJECT is active, save it
02569             if( ObjectSlots[ usCnt ].fAllocated )
02570             {
02571                   usPhysicsCount++;
02572             }
02573       }
02574 
02575 
02576       //Save the number of REAL_OBJECTs in the array
02577       FileWrite( hFile, &usPhysicsCount, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02578       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
02579       {
02580             return( FALSE );
02581       }
02582 
02583       if( usPhysicsCount != 0 )
02584       {
02585             for( usCnt=0; usCnt<NUM_OBJECT_SLOTS; usCnt++ )
02586             {
02587                   //if the REAL_OBJECT is active, save it
02588                   if( ObjectSlots[ usCnt ].fAllocated )
02589                   {
02590                         //Save the the REAL_OBJECT structure
02591                         FileWrite( hFile, &ObjectSlots[usCnt], sizeof( REAL_OBJECT ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02592                         if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( REAL_OBJECT ) )
02593                         {
02594                               return( FALSE );
02595                         }
02596                   }
02597             }
02598       }
02599 
02600       return( TRUE );
02601 }
02602 
02603 
02604 BOOLEAN     LoadPhysicsTableFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
02605 {
02606       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
02607       UINT16      usCnt=0;
02608 
02609       //make sure the objects are not allocated
02610       memset( ObjectSlots, 0, NUM_OBJECT_SLOTS * sizeof( REAL_OBJECT ) );
02611 
02612       //Load the number of REAL_OBJECTs in the array
02613       FileRead( hFile, &guiNumObjectSlots, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02614       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
02615       {
02616             return( FALSE );
02617       }
02618 
02619       //loop through and add the objects
02620       for( usCnt=0; usCnt<guiNumObjectSlots; usCnt++ )
02621       {
02622             //Load the the REAL_OBJECT structure
02623             FileRead( hFile, &ObjectSlots[usCnt], sizeof( REAL_OBJECT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02624             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( REAL_OBJECT ) )
02625             {
02626                   return( FALSE );
02627             }
02628 
02629             ObjectSlots[usCnt].pNode = NULL;
02630             ObjectSlots[usCnt].pShadow = NULL;
02631             ObjectSlots[usCnt].iID = usCnt;
02632       }
02633 
02634       return( TRUE );
02635 }
02636 
02637 
02638 UINT16 RandomGridFromRadius( INT16 sSweetGridNo, INT8 ubMinRadius, INT8 ubMaxRadius )
02639 {
02640       INT16       sX, sY;
02641       INT16       sGridNo;
02642       INT32                         leftmost;
02643       BOOLEAN     fFound = FALSE;
02644       UINT32            cnt = 0;
02645 
02646   if ( ubMaxRadius == 0 || ubMinRadius == 0 )
02647   {
02648     return( sSweetGridNo );
02649   }
02650 
02651       do
02652       {
02653             sX = (UINT16)PreRandom( ubMaxRadius );
02654             sY = (UINT16)PreRandom( ubMaxRadius );
02655 
02656     if ( ( sX < ubMinRadius || sY < ubMinRadius ) && ubMaxRadius != ubMinRadius )
02657     {
02658       continue;
02659     }
02660 
02661     if ( PreRandom( 2 ) == 0 )
02662     {
02663       sX = sX * -1;
02664     }
02665 
02666     if ( PreRandom( 2 ) == 0 )
02667     {
02668       sY = sY * -1;
02669     }
02670 
02671             leftmost = ( ( sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * sY ) )/ WORLD_COLS ) * WORLD_COLS;
02672 
02673             sGridNo = sSweetGridNo + ( WORLD_COLS * sY ) + sX;
02674 
02675     if ( sGridNo == sSweetGridNo )
02676     {
02677       continue;
02678     }
02679 
02680             if ( sGridNo >=0 && sGridNo < WORLD_MAX && 
02681                          sGridNo >= leftmost && sGridNo < ( leftmost + WORLD_COLS ) )                       
02682             {
02683                   fFound = TRUE;
02684             }
02685 
02686             cnt++;
02687 
02688             if ( cnt > 50 )
02689             {
02690                   return( NOWHERE );
02691             }
02692 
02693       } while( !fFound );
02694 
02695       return( sGridNo );
02696 }
